amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to increase and decrease funding, by $1 million, for the United States Postal Service Inspector General, to instruct the Postal Service IG to provide Congress with the operating expenses and annual revenue for each post office location for the last five years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
